upload.title: 1. Upload Images
upload.content:
1. Click the upload button at the top of the page
2. Select an image file from your computer
3. Wait for the image to be uploaded

layers.title: 2. Manage Layers
layers.content:
• Duplicate images using the copy icon
• Move layers up/down using arrow buttons
• Delete images using the trash icon
• Click on any image to edit it

edit.title: 3. Edit Images
edit.content:
1. Click on any image to open the editor
2. Use the tools to cut and shape your image
3. Click save when done

preview.title: 4. Preview in 3D
preview.content:
1. Switch to the "3D View" tab
2. View your stacked layers
3. Use numbered buttons to highlight layers

export.title: 5. Export Your Design
export.content:
1. Click the "Export PDF" button
2. Save the PDF file
3. Use it as your reference
